question: Which are the only two nations served by the Ubangi river?
option1: Central African Republic and Democratic Republic of Congo
answer: Central African Republic and Democratic Republic of Congo
explanation: Ubangi River is also known as Oubangui River. It forms the border between the Central African Republic and the Democratic Republic of Congo. It is the largest right-bank tributary of the Congo River. Mbomou and Uele Rivers joins to form Ubangi River.
